"Emergency Quest Password Matching":
"\"Password Matching\" is a function that allows you to set a password so that you will only be matched up with other players who have set the same password.

From \"Quest Information\", select \"Start Quest\" and set a password in \"Password Input\"."

"If you want to switch back from Password Matching to normal matching, open the Main Menu, select \"Communication\", then \"Party Commands\".

If you remove the password from Party Settings and apply the change, you will return to normal matching."
